newsitem.title: QATAR: lacklustre trade dominates Qatar bluechips.
newsitem.headline: lacklustre trade dominates Qatar bluechips.

text.p: Trade on Qatar's unofficial stock market almost remained at a standstill in the week to Thursday amid poor supply and demand, brokers said.
The Commercial Bank of Qatar's 18-share index crept up to 128.75 points from 128.64 the previous week.
Four shares rose, one dipped and 13 were unchanged.
Market leaders Qatar National Bank and Qatar Navigation advanced two riyals to 537 and three riyals to 688 respectively.
Qatar Cinema chalked up three riyals to 210 and Qatar Shipping won one riyal to close at 45.
But traders said business volume was so small that it could hardly lift the index.
